description: Buddy returned to us sooner than expected, but we weren’t complaining at all…neither did Barron, “I think he’s a cutie!” Little did he know, though, Buddy has a dominant side, and he was eager to show Barron, “Yeah, he’s definitely gonna be my bitch.” With that said, they seemed to be rushing back to the house to get started! Let’s just say Buddy really gave Barron a pounding of a lifetime, and rewarded him with an amazing facial, of which Barron gladly accepted.
title: Buddy & Barron: Bareback
